title: 3 and Out - Georgia Over Bama Reaction, Black Monday Firings, Wentz Liability, Crush Staley, Early Wild Card Thoughts, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Georgia Over Bama Reaction, Black Monday Firings, Wentz Liability, Crush Staley, Early Wild Card Thoughts, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to Kirby Smart and Georgia beating Nick Saban and Alabama for the natty, gives his take on the Black Monday NFL coach and GM firings, why Carson Wentz is the problem in Indy, why Brandon Staley deserves to get crushed for his week 18 decision making. He also gives some early thoughts on the upcoming Wild Card matchups and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
